{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3117706,"name":"Mark","username":"mqshaw","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/mqshaw/{size}/159985_2.png","created_at":"2023-01-07T14:59:54.527Z","cooked":"

Team 2122 is happy to publicly release the code for our 2022 off season robot, Sassitator.

Some of the core highlights are

  • Incorporation of AprilTags in our custom vision system ( TatorVision )
  • Core Sassitator code
  • Autonomous Spline Follower Code
  • Autonomous Path Generation GUI

This is available at the github repo: Team2122/2122_TeamTators (github.com) )

Thank you for viewing our code. If you have any questions, don’t hesitate to ask.
